name: A Jammed Tether
description:
You love to go explore in caves! Especially deep, vertical ones. One day, you find a huge crater in the middle of a field. It's a miracle! Or is it..?

HOW TO PLAY

Your goal is to survive the onslaught of bullets for as long as possible, while your jammed tether threatens to pull you into them. Medkits are dropping to try to keep you alive for just a little longer, but the bullets don't stop coming.

Made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK Gamejam

Music provided by zapsplat.com
